name: Cave Trap
description:
A classic 8-bit arcade game for IOS devices.

You are a treasure hunter and must escape 30 different levels by collecting diamonds and avoiding cave traps.

Featuring:

- 8 Bits Graphics
- Different 30 levels
- Great and Smooth soundtrack
- Leaderboard to compete with your friends

Just remind the 8 bit nostalgia in the 80s and 90s with this classic game.
